title: Ticket #1163: Build without old ClassAds on Windows
description:
As part of the work to replace old ClassAds with new ClassAds in Condor, we need to update the Windows Visual Studio project files. All of the files under src/classad.old/ should no longer be built. Replacing them is a compatibility API layer over new ClassAds, contained in the files src/condor_c++_util/compat_classad*.

The condor_classad module should be modified to build the new compat_classad* files, or merged into the condor_cpp module. The condor_api module will have to be modified to include the object files for compat_classad* instead of those from src/classad.old/. It may also have to include the object files from the condor_classad_new module.

The following lines should be removed from src/condor_includes/condor_sys_nt.h: 

// For now, always use old ClassAds
#if !defined( WANT_OLD_CLASSADS )
# define WANT_OLD_CLASSADS 1
#endif

The work should be done on V7_5-new_classads-branch.
